channel.title: Comments on: Benchmarks, Not Enough Details

item.title: By: Karim
item.dc:creator: Karim
item.description: I would notice that Postgresql is laso powered withg triggers and many sub language, while Mysql stands as a passif reciepient, there is no comparison between Mysql and Postgresql, better do that test with Oracle or MS SQl server.
item.content:encoded: I would notice that Postgresql is laso powered withg triggers and many sub language, while Mysql stands as a passif reciepient, there is no comparison between Mysql and Postgresql, better do that test with Oracle or MS SQl server.
